Battle Cards
View On FortressMaximus.io

Device Virus

  1. Does Device Virus scrap an upgrade from your hand or one that's attached to one of your characters?
    You must scrap an upgrade attached to one of your characters.
  2. If I play a Device Virus and select one of my armors to scrap but I have Backup Bag on that character and it scraps instead, would my opponent have to scrap armors or utilities?
    Your opponent would have to scrap the type of upgrade you chose with Device Virus.
